mapper.select: select * from (select bo.inqu_no, bo.inqu_title, bo.inqu_cnt, bo.inqu_content, bo.m_no, bo.p_no, me.m_name,m_id from board_inquery bo, member me where bo.m_no = me.m_no) sub where sub.inqu_no = #{inqu_no}

SELECT * FROM (select bo.inqu_no, bo.inqu_title, bo.inqu_cnt, bo.inqu_content, bo.inqu_reg, bo.m_no, bo.p_no, me.m_name,m_id from board_inquery bo, member me where bo.m_no = me.m_no) sub WHERE inqu_title LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%' ORDER BY inqu_no DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE board_inquery set inqu_cnt = inqu_cnt + 1 where inqu_no = #{inqu_no}
